content:
Touchstone v3.4.4 has just been deployed with support for FHIR v3.0.1. All previous FHIR3-0-0 TestScript test groups and fixtures have been replaced with FHIR3-0-1 test groups and fixtures. All test analytics data for FHIR v3.0.1 is now reset for May 2017 statistics.
Please see the Release Notes for more information - https://touchstone.aegis.net/touchstone/TouchstoneReleaseNotes
Thanks Richard. All good from my perspective. Once again, nice job!
